clir.control.querytermgen

Class QueryTermsGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • clir.control.querytermgen.QueryTermsGenerator

  • public class QueryTermsGenerator
extends Object
    The Class QueryTermsGenerator, that generates query terms from the provided folders (set in the Languages Manager). PDF term extraction is carried out here.
    Author:
    Gabriel.
